Key Match Events: Tasos Bakasetas scored a goal three minutes into the second half after Caoimhín Kelleher deflected the ball into his own net.
Petros Mantalos scored a late goal in the 91st minute after Caoimhín Kelleher made a mistake.
Ireland conceded early into the second half, a familiar failing for them.
Post-Match Reflections: Greek players fell to their knees and hugged each other at full time, showing an emotional reaction to the victory.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played in honor of the late George Baldock, with fans chanting his name and singing songs.
